translations.chinese: 令豐人徙關中者皆復終身。
translations.english: He commanded that Feng people who moved to Guanzhong all be exempted from service for life.

translations.chinese: 五月，詔曰：「粵人之俗，好相攻擊，前時秦徙中縣之民南方三郡，使與百粵雜處。
translations.english: In the fifth month, the edict said: "Yue people's customs are fond of attacking each other. Previously Qin moved central counties' people to the southern three commanderies to mix with the Baiyue.

translations.chinese: 會天下誅秦，南海尉它居南方長治之，甚有文理，中縣人以故不耗減，粵人相攻擊之俗益止，俱賴其力。
translations.english: When the world executed Qin, Nanhai magistrate Zhao Tuo dwelt in the south and governed it for a long time. He was very orderly and reasonable. Central county people therefore did not diminish. Yue people's custom of attacking each other stopped even more. All relied on his strength.
Now establish Zhao Tuo as King of Nanyue."
He sent Lu Jia to personally confer the seal and tassels.
